title: The First-ever Baligham Village Mobile Health Fair
description: "An unforgettable story of the triumph of the human spirit over poverty, hopelessness and despair."The First-ever Baligham Mobile Health Fair is an unforgettable story of the triumph of the human spirit over poverty, hopelessness and despair. It is also the story of selfless people whose tireless dedication will change the way you look at sustainable development and social change. Combining colorful illustration, rich culture and an unforgettable story, award-winning philanthropist and humanitarian Margaret Galabe tells the story of one of the most profound expressions of generosity in Baligham's history. It is a story of volunteers from Canada, Germany, Ireland, the Czech Republic, and the United States, working together with local Cameroonians to bring health care directly to the front doors of families, mothers and children, in a place you've probably never heard of.
author: Margaret Galabe
